title: Ransomware disruption of warehouse operations
description: Compromise of endpoints and servers causes encryption and dispatch outage
existing_controls: EDR partial deployment; daily backups; admin MFA

title: Customer portal exploit and data exposure
description: Web/API vulnerability leads to unauthorized data access
existing_controls: WAF baseline; patching process; Azure logging partial

title: Credential phishing leading to account takeover
description: User credentials stolen and used for mailbox fraud and VPN access
existing_controls: Admin MFA; phishing simulations; mail security gateway

title: Supplier remote access misuse
description: Compromised vendor channel used for unauthorized changes

title: Backup environment tampering
description: Attacker attempts deletion or encryption of backups before detonation
existing_controls: Immutable offsite copy; privileged admin separation partial

title: Cloud misconfiguration public exposure
description: Storage/network policy drift creates unintended data exposure
existing_controls: Ad hoc cloud reviews; no continuous posture checks

title: Insider data leakage from sensitive shares
description: Authorized user exfiltrates HR or contract data
